javadoc: The listener interface for notification of changes to a DataTypeManager

methods.name: categoryAdded

params.name: dtm
params.comment: the dataType manager

params.name: path
params.comment: the categoryPath of the newly added category.

methods.name: categoryRemoved
methods.comment: Notification when a category is removed.

params.name: dtm
params.comment: data type manager associated with the category

params.name: path
params.comment: the categoryPath of the category that was removed.

methods.name: categoryRenamed

params.name: dtm
params.comment: data type manager associated with the category

params.name: oldPath
params.comment: the path of the category before it was renamed.

params.name: newPath
params.comment:
the path of the category after it was renamed.  This path will only differ in
 the last segment of the path.

methods.name: categoryMoved
methods.comment: Notification when a category is reparented to new category.

params.name: dtm
params.comment: data type manager associated with the category

params.name: oldPath
params.comment: the path of the category before it was moved.

params.name: newPath
params.comment: the path of the category after it was moved.

methods.name: dataTypeAdded
methods.comment: Notification when a data type is added to a category

params.name: dtm
params.comment: data type manager for the given category paths.

params.name: path
params.comment: the DataTypePath of the newly added datatype.

methods.name: dataTypeRemoved
methods.comment: Notification when data type is removed.

params.name: dtm
params.comment: data type manager for the given category paths.

params.name: path
params.comment: the DataTypePath of the removed datatype.

methods.name: dataTypeRenamed
methods.comment: Notification when data type is renamed.

params.name: dtm
params.comment: data type manager for the given category paths.

params.name: oldPath
params.comment: the path of the datatype before it was renamed.

params.name: newPath
params.comment: the path of the datatype after it was renamed.

methods.name: dataTypeMoved
methods.comment: Notification when a data type is moved.

params.name: dtm
params.comment: data type manager for the given category paths.

params.name: oldPath
params.comment: the path of the datatype before it was moved.

params.name: newPath
params.comment: the path of the datatype after it was moved.

methods.name: dataTypeChanged
methods.comment: Notification when data type is changed.

params.name: dtm
params.comment: data type manager for the given category paths.

params.name: path
params.comment: the path of the datatype that changed.

methods.name: dataTypeReplaced
methods.comment: Notification when a data type has been replaced.

params.name: dtm
params.comment: data type manager for the given category paths.

params.name: oldPath
params.comment: the path of the datatype that was replaced.

params.name: newPath
params.comment: the path of the datatype that replaced the existing datatype.

params.name: newDataType
params.comment: the new dataType that replaced the old dataType

methods.name: favoritesChanged
methods.comment: Notification the favorite status of a datatype has changed

params.name: dtm
params.comment: data type manager for the given category paths.

params.name: path
params.comment: the DataTypePath of the datatype had its favorite status changed.

params.name: isFavorite
params.comment: reflects the current favorite status of the datatype.

methods.name: sourceArchiveChanged
methods.comment:
Notification that the information for a particular source archive has changed. Typically,
 this would be because it was renamed or moved.

params.name: dataTypeManager
params.comment: data type manager referring to the given source information.

methods.name: sourceArchiveAdded
methods.comment:
Notification that the information for a source archive has been added. This happens when
 a data type from the indicated source archive is added to this data type manager.

params.name: dataTypeManager
params.comment: data type manager referring to the given source information.

params.name: sourceArchive
params.comment: the new data type source information

name: DataTypeManagerChangeListener
comment: The listener interface for notification of changes to a DataTypeManager
